name: MIS Sentence Status Changes
description: v1.0 Report lists sentence updates for reason 'New Sentence'. Prompts for start and end dates of status changes.  Created for Vantive 2070125

dataset.name: Sentence Status Changes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RECORD_DATETIME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.CALC_REASON, AT_EVENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_COURT_EVENT_TYPE.COURT_EVENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_COURT_EVENT.OUTCOME, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_EVENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_COURT_EVENT_TYPE AT_DIM_COURT_EVENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.FACT_COURT_EVENT AT_FACT_COURT_EVENT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_COURT_CASE AT_COURT_CASE WHERE (AT_FACT_COURT_EVENT.COURT_EVENT_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_COURT_EVENT_TYPE.COURT_EVENT_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_COURT_EVENT.EVENT_DATE_SK = AT_EVENT_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.COURT_CASE_SK = AT_FACT_COURT_EVENT.COURT_CASE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_COURT_CASE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RECORD_DATETIME BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-10-2010 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('14-10-2010 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.CALC_REASON_CODE = 'NEW' AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT RECORD_DATETIME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, CALC_REASON, DAY_DATE, COURT_EVENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, OUTCOME, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
